definitions.definition: To make ready for a specific future purpose; to set up ; to assemble or equip ; to forearm.
examples: We prepared the spacecraft for takeoff.

definitions.definition: To make ready for eating or drinking; to cook .
examples: We prepared a fish for dinner.

definitions.definition: To make oneself ready; to get ready, make preparation.
examples: We prepared for a bumpy ride.

definitions.definition: To produce or make by combining elements; to synthesize , compound .
examples: She prepared a meal from what was left in the cupboards.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To make ready for a specific future purpose; to set up ; to assemble or equip ; to forearm.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To make ready for eating or drinking; to cook .
( intransitive ) To make oneself ready; to get ready, make preparation.
( transitive ) To produce or make by combining elements; to synthesize , compound .
